content:
Kal wipes the sweat from his brow and takes a sip from his canteen. "Challenging terrain down here. Wouldn't you agree?" he says. "Say, I have an idea. Care for a little friendly competition? I planned to reach the Arteries today and set up camp. Why don't we see who can get there first?"

A) You're on! Discard all   and edge from Kal and attach the HELPING HAND mission to him. Travel to one of the Artery locations before he gains too much of an edge over you.

B) Sorry, Kal. We've got work to do! Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Discard Kal Iver.
